{"eventVersion":"1.08","userIdentity":{"type":"IAMUser","principalId":"AIDAU33DBSJ5M2LXKXXXS","arn":"arn:aws:iam::999999999999:user/test@test.com","accountId":"999999999999","accessKeyId":"ASIAU33DBSJ5FFMSM3FW","userName":"test@test.com","sessionContext":{"sessionIssuer":{},"webIdFederationData":{},"attributes":{"mfaAuthenticated":"false","creationDate":"2021-06-05T23:37:12Z"}}},"eventTime":"2021-06-06T00:36:08Z","eventSource":"serverlessrepo.amazonaws.com","eventName":"CreateApplication","awsRegion":"ap-northeast-1","sourceIPAddress":"202.32.14.177","userAgent":"aws-internal/3 aws-sdk-java/1.11.1022 Linux/5.4.109-57.183.amzn2int.x86_64 OpenJDK_64-Bit_Server_VM/25.292-b10 java/1.8.0_292 vendor/Oracle_Corporation cfg/retry-mode/legacy","requestParameters":{"readmeBody":"# AutoStopOntime

Auto stop EC2, RDS instances on time

Made with ❤️ by DXC. Available on the [AWS Serverless Application Repository](https://aws.amazon.com/serverless)","author":"DXC","templateBody":"AWSTemplateFormatVersion: 2010-09-09
Transform: AWS::Serverless-2016-10-31
Parameters:
  LambdaFunctionName:
    Type: String
    Default: auto-stop-ontime
    Description: Lambda function name
  LambdaRoleName:
    Type: String
    Default: EC2_AutoStopOnetimeRole
    Description: Lambda function name role
  CloudWatchRuleName:
    Type: String
    Default: EC2_AutoStopOnetimeRole
    Description: CloudWatch rule name
  AutoStopCron:
    Type: String
    Default: cron(0 13 * * ? *)
    Description: EC2/RDS auto stop schedule
Resources:
  LambdaRole:
    Type: AWS::IAM::Role
    Properties:
      RoleName:
        Ref: LambdaRoleName
      AssumeRolePolicyDocument:
        Version: '2012-10-17'
        Statement:
        - Action: sts:AssumeRole
          Effect: Allow
          Principal:
            Service: lambda.amazonaws.com
      Path: /
      Policies:
      - PolicyDocument:
          Version: '2012-10-17'
          Statement:
          - Effect: Allow
            Action:
            - ec2:Describe*
            - ec2:StopInstances
            - rds:Describe*
            - rds:stopDBInstance
            Resource: '*'
          - Effect: Allow
            Action:
            - logs:CreateLogGroup
            - logs:CreateLogStream
            - logs:PutLogEvents
            Resource: '*'
        PolicyName: CloudWatch
  LambdaFunction:
    Type: AWS::Serverless::Function
    DependsOn: LambdaRole
    Properties:
      FunctionName:
        Ref: LambdaFunctionName
      Handler: index.handler
      Runtime: nodejs14.x
      MemorySize: 256
      Timeout: 10
      CodeUri: s3://onecloud-serverless-repository/c3de3cf0a0146db3703b5e7f8a24ffc9
      Role:
        Fn::GetAtt:
        - LambdaRole
        - Arn
  CloudWatchStopRule:
    Type: AWS::Events::Rule
    Properties:
      Name:
        Ref: CloudWatchRuleName
      Description: EC2/RDS auto stop rule
      Targets:
      - Arn:
          Fn::GetAtt:
          - LambdaFunction
          - Arn
        Id: AutoStopRule
      ScheduleExpression:
        Ref: AutoStopCron
